[align=center][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2331053][img]https://www.hackforums.news/assets/v4/notablethreads-mix.png[/img][/url][/align]

[color=#FFFFFF][b]Announcements[/b][/color]
[list]
[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6096399][color=#FFFFFF]Discord Policy[/color][/url] - [mention=1]
Omniscient has released the rules-based around the new discord policy. We did mention in last week's edition that you should read up on these but if you haven't already make sure you read this thread as it is very important that you do as you may get your account warned. If you have your discord in any thread and you have not verified your discord with the site then make sure you edit your threads.
[/list]

[color=#FFFFFF][b]Testimonials[/b][/color]
[list]
[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6095739][color=#FFFFFF]Overdue Testimonial to HF | 6 Year Experience[/color][/url] - [mention=2144239]
A member currently known as ๖ۣۜDødgygeez has shared how six long years of their life has been affected by Hack Forums. Sadly the first few years were very hard to remember for the member but they have gone into a lot of detail of how the recent years have made a massive difference to the member. They even mentioned that the lounge is the best place on the site.
[/list]

[color=#FFFFFF][b]Entertaining Threads[/b][/color]
[list]
[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6096954][color=#FFFFFF]What is the strangest conspiracy theory you've ever heard of?[/color][/url] - [mention=3459543]
flavoral is here with a massive question that isn't just a normal question but a really unique one. The member is asking you if you have ever heard of a really strange conspiracy theory. Members have replied with some really funny comments about the stuff they have heard. some people have even mentioned some things that they believe in and how they were brought up to believe it.

[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6096767][color=#FFFFFF]Does Omniscient know you exist?[/color][/url] - [mention=420]
We all wonder we are known on the site. Some of you will care about it and others won't really bother about being known because they think that they are so big that they are just a massive role model. Red Sox has made a thread talking about if the owner of the website, Omniscient knows who you are. Some members have said they don't think so, and some have shared a small experience with Omniscient.

[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6093499][color=#FFFFFF]Can you recognize these HF members by their avatar? #10[/color][/url] - [mention=3123052]
Fortunate has reached the tenth version of his quiz where they ask people who are who by an avatar. We wanted to congratulate Fortunate on the tenth edition and to keep up the great work. The quiz is always a fun little thing to do and has some real-time and care in the making of the thread. It almost reminds us of the first few editions of the Hack Forums News.
[/list]

[color=#FFFFFF][b]Contests & Giveaways[/b][/color]
[list]
[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6096780][color=#FFFFFF]1000 Bytes Contest || Post to Enter || 1 Winner[/color][/url] - [mention=4637507]
A member known as Skateboard is giving one very lucky contest winner a chance at 1000 Bytes. Al you have to do to have a chance at winning is to post and that's it. Nothing hard about making a nice little post. You might even get an egg if you are lucky.

[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6096400][color=#FFFFFF][PANTHERS]$20 BTC GIVEAWAY | QL & POST TO ENTER[/color][/url] - [mention=1200358]
Gσđfαtђα is hosting a giveaway sponsored by the group Panthers. The giveaway requires you to quick love the thread and post to have a chance at winning $20 in bitcoin. If you want to get your hands on this free money make sure you get yourself posting in this giveaway!
[/list]

[color=transparent]       [/color][/size][/font]
posts.subject: Hack Forums News // Edition 477

posts.message:
[font=Trebuchet MS][size=medium][color=transparent]       [/color]

[align=center][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2774521][img]https://www.hackforums.news/assets/v4/cryptonews-james.png[/img][/url][/align]

[b][color=white]Twitter Crypto Scam[/color][/b]
On July 15, Twitter accounts belonging to high-profile individuals all tweeted the same message. It claimed that they would double any Bitcoin sent to their address, in the next 30 minutes, as a part of their giving back. Unbeknownst to many unsuspecting victims, this was not the case. It was a scam. Malicious actors had reportedly gained access to a Twitter admin panel through social engineering. It allowed them to gain control of accounts that belonged to celebrities and politicians, among others, and then send out tweets. The perpetrators managed to trick over 300 people into sending them almost 13 Bitcoin. That's approximately $120,000. The BTC was transferred to different wallets that may have connections with Binance, BitGo, and Coinbase, according to Cointelegraph's analysis. Bitcoin Core developer Wladimir van der Laan said that some of the victims might get their Bitcoin back, through a double-spend attack. That would involve sending another transaction of the same value with a higher fee than the previous one.[i][size=x-small][url=https://techcrunch.com/2020/07/15/twitter-hacker-admin-scam/] >>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Credit Scores Coming to Decentralized Finance[/color][/b]
Teller Finance has raised $1 million in a seed round lead by Framework Ventures. Teller is an algorithmic credit risk protocol that aims to "enable the creation of decentralized lending markets that can offer unsecured loans." They want to bring together the best of both worlds and give people instantly accessible loans, powered by blockchain technology, while still keeping the traditional idea of credit scores. Users who want to take out a loan can use their credit score provided by centralized financial data. This enables decentralized finance (DeFi) platforms to offer loans without requiring as much collateral. The founder of Teller, Ryan Berkun, said that it would be possible to go "down to zero collateral." DeFi loans don't stop there, though. They can also affect your credit score. If a borrower were to default on a loan, their credit score would down, similar to how centralized lending markets work.[i][size=x-small][url=https://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20200716005148/en/Teller-Raises-1-Million-Seed-Led-Framework/] >>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]John McAfee's Promise[/color][/b]
In 2017, the founder of McAfee, John McAfee, made a bold statement. He tweeted that he thought Bitcoin would reach $500,000 within three years. He didn't stop there. Replying to another Twitter user, McAfee made a bet and said that he would "eat [his] dick on national television" if it did not. That tweet was posted on July 17. It has now been three years, and, well, Bitcoin has not reached $500,000 yet. It's hovering at just over $9,100. In a rather disappointing turn, McAfee tweeted on July 17, 2020, claiming that three years means three years and six months. People will have to check back in at the end of the year to see if he's carrying out his promise.[i][size=x-small][url=https://twitter.com/officialmcafee/status/887024683379544065] >>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[color=transparent]   [/color]

[align=center][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=4570721][img]https://hackforums.news/assets/v4/animenews-megane.png[/img][/url][/align]

[b][color=white]New Love Live! Project to be Titled Love Live! Superstar!![/color][/b]
Another installment for the "Love Live!" series has been announced. The upcoming anime has been dubbed, "Love live! Superstar!!" and will revolve around five new characters, Shibuya Kanon, Tang Keke, Arashi Chisato, Heanna Sumire, and Hazuki Ren. The five characters are based out of Yuigaoka Girls High School, and what makes this new is the usage of the term "band." Usually, with this series, the girls are considered  part of a "group" rather than a band. Does this mean that the usage of musical instruments will also be included? Not much is known so far about this anime, so stay tuned. [i][size=x-small][url=https://otakumode.com/news/5f0d68281faaffeb06c1ed5a/New-Love-Live!-Project-to-be-Titled-Love-Live!-Superstar!!]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Re:Zero's Rem and Ram Star in Season 2 Trailers![/color][/b]
We are thankful for the summer 2020 anime season, as we are finally able to watch the third season of "Re:Zero," after hearing that it would be delayed during the spring 2020 season. Your favorite maids, Rem and Ram, have returned. If you haven't done so already, two short, separate trailers were released for [url=https://youtu.be/Zzv42rrtUbM]Rem[/url] and [url=https://youtu.be/94_4zvvXuUM]Ram[/url]. It is also good to note that the anime's second season will have two parts. The first 13 episodes will air during the current summer 2020 season, while the remaining second half is scheduled to air in January of next year. [i][size=x-small][url=https://otakumode.com/news/5f02ea3ed6feadd81793ea78/Re-Zero-s-Rem-and-Ram-Star-in-Season-2-Trailers!]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Fly Me to the Moon Anime Releases New Teaser Trailer![/color][/b]
"Fly Me to the Moon" has released a 30-second preview on [url=https://youtu.be/3M7w-ROU62U]YouTube[/url] and features one of the voice actors, Enoki Junya who will be portraying the protagonist, Nasa. If you look at the video preview, you will notice that the girl in it, known as Tsukasa, looks like the girl from Porter Robinson's [url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fzQ6gRAEoy0]Shelter[/url] music video! Of course, there is no correlation between the two, but it is something cute to consider! The anime will be adapted from the manga created by Hata Kenjirou. "A boy named Nasa is saved from a truck accident by a mysterious girl, Tsukasa. After he confesses his love to her, she agrees to date him only if they get married. Three years later, she arrives on his doorstep to fulfill this promise." [i][size=x-small][url=https://otakumode.com/news/5f0ec39a4ccab3bf272eaa57/Fly-Me-to-the-Moon-Anime-Releases-New-Teaser-Trailer!]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Haikyuu!!: To the Top 2nd Cour to Air from October![/color][/b]
If you follow the "Haikyuu" series, you will be delighted to know that the second cour of the fourth season will air sometime this October. For those unaware of what a cour is, generally, a season in anime is classified as a cour. For example, an anime with 12 episodes is one cour. If it were to have a second season, the additional episodes after that are a second cour. Usually, you would label the anime as a "two-cour" anime. In other words, it is a fancy way of saying two seasons! A 30-second [url=https://twitter.com/animehaikyu_com/status/1282600575763312640?s=20]Tweet[/url] was also posted showing off the boys from Karasuno High School's volleyball team. [i][size=x-small][url=https://otakumode.com/news/5f0c24b10e58c75348c9f168/Haikyuu!!-To-the-Top-2nd-Cour-to-Air-from-October!]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[color=transparent]    [/color]

[align=center][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2890436][img]https://hackforums.news/assets/v4/vibes-pikachu.png[/img][/url][/align]

[b][color=#ccffff]Horoscopes[/color][/b] / [i]Jul 20, 2020 - Jul 26, 2020[/i]

[list]
[*][b][color=#cc3333]Aries ♈[/color][/b]
[i]"Are you ready for a fresh start on the home front? This week’s new moon in your domestic sector could direct you to get a move on. Whether you want to redecorate, welcome a pet, or begin a small business, this is the time to do so.

The sun opposes sobering Saturn the same day, and you may realize what you need to do to create a better work/life balance. If this means making more time for homey activities or deciding to work from home, this move could turn out to be good for you.

Some relief is on the way as the sun moves into Leo midweek for a four-week stay. It encourages you to become more playful and allow your inner child to express itself through art, music, or anything else you find absorbing.

Finally, as messenger Mercury aligns with electric Uranus midweek, you could get the perfect gadget that helps make your life much easier."[/i][i][size=xx-small][url=https://www.horoscope.com/us/horoscopes/general/horoscope-general-weekly.aspx?sign=1]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[*][b][color=#ff99ff]Taurus ♉[/color][/b]
[i]"Fresh developments in your communication sector hint at an opportunity that you might relish. If you accept it, it could solve a problem that has taken up a fair amount of your time recently.

The new moon in your communication zone opposes cautious Saturn in your sector of far horizons, and a revelation could help you understand how you’ve been limiting yourself when there’s no need to. This lively lunar phase encourages you to jettison old beliefs that may be keeping you stuck in a certain lifestyle, job, or even relationship. It’s time to let go of the past and blossom.

Plus, the sun’s move into Leo and your home and family sector could inspire you to get involved in more family-oriented activities. If you have time to beautify your home or create some art or crafts to enhance the atmosphere, you’ll enjoy doing so."[/i][i][size=xx-small][url=https://www.horoscope.com/us/horoscopes/general/horoscope-general-weekly.aspx?sign=2]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[*][b][color=#66cc33]Gemini ♊[/color][/b]
[i]"This week’s new moon in your personal money zone can usher in a new beginning if you want one. If you’ve felt pressured by certain financial institutions or money worries, this lunar phase encourages you to do something about it to ease any tension or anxiety. Whatever your problem, there is a way out if you can get the right help and advice and you follow through on it. There is no need to suffer unnecessarily.

On a lighter note, the sun’s move into Leo and your sector of communication can put a positive spin on things. Because of this, you may begin to see improvements sooner rather than later. This is the time to promote your work, business, and abilities, whether online or off. And the more you do so, the better for you.

Are you in need of a bright idea? A clever Mercury-Uranus angle can add a touch of genius to the equation."[/i][i][size=xx-small][url=https://www.horoscope.com/us/horoscopes/general/horoscope-general-weekly.aspx?sign=3]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[*][b][color=#3399ff]Cancer ♋[/color][/b]
[i]"Get ready for an interesting week in which the new moon in your sign encourages you to go after what you want. This new moon is the best of the year for you, and it’s a call to consider your needs and desires. What is the one thing you want to accomplish that would mean the most to you? If you know what it is, this is the time to start.

However, as this new moon also opposes cautious Saturn in your relationship sector, there is a chance that someone may try to stop you. Don’t let them. You have a right to be happy and have your needs met. If this idea leaves you excited and upbeat, then give it your all.

Money matters will also come into focus as the radiant sun enters Leo on Wednesday. The coming weeks could see you enjoying a spending spree, which might involve purchasing gifts and treats for others as well as yourself."[/i][i][size=xx-small][url=https://www.horoscope.com/us/horoscopes/general/horoscope-general-weekly.aspx?sign=4]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[*][b][color=#ff9933]Leo ♌[/color][/b]
[i]"A powerful lunar phase in a secluded sector encourages you to create positive habits that can help you progress spiritually. This might include meditation, mindfulness, a practice such as yoga or tai chi, or even finding a teacher or life coach to work with, online or off. By attending to your inner life, your outer life can flourish, and this new moon is the time to make a start.

Nevertheless, it’s opposed by prudent Saturn in your lifestyle sector, which suggests that being overly busy could stop you from integrating these new habits into your everyday life. This is an opportunity to be discriminating and jettison anything that is a waste of time. In fact, good time management can be crucial to your success.

The good news is that the sun moves into your sign midweek for a four-week stay, giving you a new lease on life. Your confidence and vitality can increase, allowing you to accomplish much more."[/i][i][size=xx-small][url=https://www.horoscope.com/us/horoscopes/general/horoscope-general-weekly.aspx?sign=5]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[*][b][color=#339933]Virgo ♍[/color][/b]
[i]"Are you eager to make the most of your social life? With the new moon in Cancer, you could join an interesting group, decide to move in new circles, or make the acquaintance of someone who becomes a supportive friend. Whatever actions you take can enrich your life because of the people you’ll meet.

This new moon opposes taskmaster Saturn in your leisure zone, so one side of you might prefer to enjoy plenty of alone time doing your own thing. And while this can help you hone a skill or perfect a talent, you could miss out on the rich interactions that can be yours if you get out and about.

In addition, the sun’s move into Leo and a secluded sector for four weeks can be a chance to reflect on your present situation. Do you need to find closure on anything? Tie up those loose ends and let go of anything that no longer serves your best interests."[/i][i][size=xx-small][url=https://www.horoscope.com/us/horoscopes/general/horoscope-general-weekly.aspx?sign=6]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[*][b][color=#3366ff]Libra ♎[/color][/b]
[i]"Are you ready to catch the moon tide and ride it to success? The new moon is in your sector of goals and ambitions on Monday, so this is the time to do so. It’s worth using this lunar energy to help build momentum as you kick-start a new plan or project.

Is there anything that could stop you? Because this lunar phase opposes Saturn in your home and family sector, there’s a chance that domestic responsibilities could hold you back. If there’s a way to delegate tasks so you have more time, try to do so.

Finally, the sun’s move into Leo midweek ushers in a positive four weeks in which your social life can get livelier. If you have the opportunity to meet with friends in person, you’ll have a great time. But even connecting online can encourage new friendships and even romance."[/i][i][size=xx-small][url=https://www.horoscope.com/us/horoscopes/general/horoscope-general-weekly.aspx?sign=7]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[*][b][color=#8B0000]Scorpio ♏[/color][/b]
[i]"This week, a seed may be planted that leads to a new opportunity, and it could be one that takes you out of your comfort zone and includes something of a learning curve. The new moon in your sector of far horizons encourages you to take the road less traveled and be bold.

However, as it also opposes prudent Saturn, a fear of the unknown could hold you back. If you want to take your life in a new and exciting direction, you’ll need to move beyond this, feel the fear, and do it anyway.

This message can also apply to your goals and ambitions as the sun moves into Leo and a prominent sector of your chart. The coming four weeks are a good opportunity to show yourself in the best light by promoting your skills and abilities, upgrading your resume or online profile, and tweaking your brand.

Finally, as chatty Mercury aligns with electric Uranus, an encounter could seem like a breath of fresh air."[/i][i][size=xx-small][url=https://www.horoscope.com/us/horoscopes/general/horoscope-general-weekly.aspx?sign=8]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[*][b][color=#FFFF00]Sagittarius ♐[/color][/b]
[i]"It’s time to tap into your power source because the new moon in an intense zone can inspire you to dive deep and discover hidden treasures. This new moon occurs in your sector of shared assets, birth, transition, and transformation, one of the more potent areas of your chart.

It’s time to enrich your life by discovering more about your inner self. You can learn how, by letting go of trapped and frozen emotions, you can free yourself to be successful and abundant.

What might stop you is too much focus on material goods and resources. While they’re necessary, they can keep your attention on the outer world. The right balance of inner and outer can be better, though.

If you’re ready to have some fun, the sun’s move into your travel and adventure zone encourages you to broaden your horizons and take a well-deserved trip if you’re able to. If you’ve been stuck at home for a while, the change will do you a world of good"[/i][i][size=xx-small][url=https://www.horoscope.com/us/horoscopes/general/horoscope-general-weekly.aspx?sign=9]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[*][b][color=#663333]Capricorn ♑[/color][/b]
[i]"The new moon in your relationship zone could coincide with changes to a partnership or other association. This can be one of the better times to take a developing romance to the next stage, especially if you’re enjoying someone’s company.

However, as this lunar phase opposes sobering Saturn in your sign, your focus on your goals and plans could detract from any enjoyment you might get from being in a relationship. Before you commit to another, you’ll need to decide what you want: success or companionship. You can have both, but you’ll need to maintain a balance to keep things sweet.

Meanwhile, the sun’s move into an intense sector of your chart, where it will be for the coming four weeks, could put your focus on deep-seated issues. This can be a time of drama and challenges that, once resolved, leave you feeling happier and more energized. You might also be eager to take stock of your business or finances and make some key adjustments."[/i][i][size=xx-small][url=https://www.horoscope.com/us/horoscopes/general/horoscope-general-weekly.aspx?sign=10]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[*][b][color=#9966ff]Aquarius ♒[/color][/b]
[i]"New goals require time, and this week brings a chance to make any necessary changes to your routines so you can have more of it. The new moon in your lifestyle sector means that this is a great opportunity to reorganize your schedule and jettison any activities that aren’t working for you. Whether you want better health, a new job, a successful business, or just to be happy, this is a good time to implement new strategies so you can accomplish your aims.

With this lunar phase opposite cautious Saturn, you could hold yourself back by thinking that you don’t deserve it. If so, this might be something to work on. You fully deserve the best in life.

Relationships come into focus as the sun moves into charismatic Leo midweek. This can be excellent for romance and enhancing and improving a current partnership. This influence can also be perfect for negotiation, reaching a compromise, and collaborating on a plan or project."[/i][i][size=xx-small][url=https://www.horoscope.com/us/horoscopes/general/horoscope-general-weekly.aspx?sign=11]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[*][b][color=#cccc66]Pisces ♓[/color][/b]
[i]"The new moon in your sector of creativity makes this one of the better times to display your work, online, via social media, or by putting it in local shops or craft fairs. This lunar phase also takes place in the sign of Cancer, so you may tend to hold back for fear of criticism. Yet you can be your own worst critic at times.

It also won’t help for you to compare yourself to others, because this could stop you in your tracks as well. What you have to offer is unique, so ignore those fears and determine to take action. You never know who may see your work and love it immediately, in which case things can just keep getting better and better for you.

The sun’s move into Leo and your lifestyle sector on Wednesday begins a four-week phase in which you can benefit from streamlining your routines and taking on new, more life-enhancing habits."[/i][i][size=xx-small][url=https://www.horoscope.com/us/horoscopes/general/horoscope-general-weekly.aspx?sign=12]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]
[/list]

[color=transparent]      [/color]
